{{infobox shopping mall | | shopping_mall_name = SM City Baliwag | image = SM City Baliwag logo.png | image_width = 200px | image_alt = SM City Baliwag logo | caption = ''"We've got it all for you!"''
''"Baliwag's shopping destination"'' | location = DRT Highway, Brgy. Pagala, [[Baliwag]], [[Bulacan]] | opening_date = December 12, 2008 | developer = [[SM Prime Holdings]] | manager = [[SM Prime Holdings]] | owner = [[Henry Sy|Henry Sy, Sr.]] | gross income = P1, 709, 355, 789.35 | location for = mall shows, album launches, flagship stores and premiere nights. | number_of_buildings = 1 | architect = Jose Siao Ling & Associates | number_of_stores = more than 300 shops and restaurants | number_of_anchors = | floor_area = 61,000 mÂ² | parking = 1000 cars | floors = 2 | website = [http://smsupermalls.com/smsupermalls/index.php?p=651&mall=4 SM City Baliwag Official Website] }} '''SM City Baliwag''' is a shopping mall owned, developed and operated by [[SM Prime Holdings]]. It is the second [[SM Supermall]] in the Bulacan Province after [[SM City Marilao]], the 3rd and last SM Mall among the company's expansion in 2008 and the 33rd SM Mall in the list. The mall is located at DRT Highway, Brgy. Pagala, Baliwag, Bulacan. It opened on December 12, 2008 which features anchors like the SM Department Store, SM Hypermarket, SM Cinemas, Food Court and other anchors like the SM Appliance Center, Watsons Drugstore, and a games arcade. == Major Anchors == *SM Department Store *SM Hypermarket *SM Cinemas *SM Food Court *SM Appliance Center *ACE Hardware == See also == {{S-start}} {{S-bef|before=[[SM City Rosales]]}} {{s-ttl|title=33rd ''[[SM Supermalls|SM Supermall]]''|years=2008}} {{s-aft|after=[[SM City Naga]]}} {{S-end}} {{SMPH}} {{Navbox |name = SM Department Store |title = [[SM Department Store|{{color|#FFFFFF|SM Department Store}}]] |titlestyle = background:#0000A0; color:#FFFFFF |groupstyle = background::#0000A0; color:#0000A0 |group1 = Branches:|Upcoming Branches: |list2 = {{nowrap begin}} [[SM City Consolacion|Consolacion, Cebu]]{{Â·w}} [[SM City Taguig|Fort Bonifacio]]{{Â·w}} [[SM City North Davao|Lanang]]{{nowrap end}} }} {{Navbox |name = SM Hypermarket Branches |title = [[SM Hypermarket|{{color|#0000A0|SM Hypermarket}}]] |titlegroup = |titlestyle = background:#00FF00; color:#0000A0 |groupstyle = background::#00FF00; color:#0000A0 |group1 = Branches:|
